param.name: q
param.notes: The search string

param.name: object
param.notes: Supports these types of objects: All public posts (post), people (user), pages (page), events (event), groups (group), check-ins (checkin)

method.name: GET
method.notes: Search over all public objects in the social graph

param.name: album
param.notes: Represents the ID of the album object.

param.name: metadata
param.notes: The Graph API supports introspection of objects, which enables you to see all of the connections an object has without knowing its type ahead of time.

response.property: The photo album ID
An object containing the ID and name of the profile who posted this album
The title of the album
The description of the album
The location of the album
A link to this album on Facebook
The number of photos in this album
The time the photo album was initially created
The last time the photo album was updated

param.name: since
param.notes: A unix timestamp or any date accepted by strtotime

param.name: until
param.notes: A unix timestamp or any date accepted by strtotime

param.name: limit
param.notes: Limit the number of items returned.

param.name: offset

method.name: GET
method.notes: Specifies information about an event, including the location, event name, and which invitees plan to attend.

response.property: The event ID
An object containing the name and ID of the user who owns the event
The event title
The long-form HTML description of the event
The start time of the event, an ISO-8601 formatted date/time
The end time of the event, an ISO-8601 formatted date/time
The location for this event, a string name
The location of this event, a structured address object with the properties street, city, state, zip, country, latitude, and longitude
The visibility of this event. Can be 'OPEN', 'CLOSED', or 'SECRET'
The last time the event was updated

The caption given to this photo
The album-sized view of the photo
The full-sized source of the photo
The height of the photo, in pixels
The width of the photo, in pixels
A link to the photo on Facebook
The time the photo was initially published
The last time the photo or its caption was updated

param.notes: Represents the ID of the photo object.

method.name: GET
method.notes: An individual entry in a profile's feed

response.property: The post ID
An object containing the ID and name of the user who posted the message
A list of the profiles mentioned or targeted in this post
The message
If available, a link to the picture included with this post
The link attached to this post
The name of the link
The caption of the link (appears beneath the link name)
A description of the link (appears beneath the link caption)
If available, the source link attached to this post (for example, a flash or video file)
A link to an icon representing the type of this post
A string indicating which application was used to create this post
A list of available action names and links (including commenting, liking, and an optional app-specified action)
The number of likes on this post
The time the post was initially published
The time of the last comment on this post

param.name: checkin
param.notes: Represents the ID of the checkin object.

param.name: metadata
param.notes: The Graph API supports introspection of objects, which enables you to see all of the connections an object has without knowing its type ahead of time.

method.name: GET
method.notes: A check-in that was made through Facebook Places.

response.property: The checkin id
The ID and name of the user who made the check-in.
The users the author tagged in the check-in.
The ID, name, and location of the Facebook Page that represents the location of the check-in.
The message the user added to the check-in.
The latitude and longitude of the check-in location.
The ID and name of the application that made the check-in.
The time the check-in was created.
